Functions¶

calculate.py¶

calculate.centroidBC(bolts, forces, axes)¶

calculate forces and moments at bolting centroid

calculate.extract(data)¶

This function extracts all the necessary data used from the inputs.yml file

Parameters

data (dict) – full inputs.yml file

Returns

df with structural characteristics

Return type

pandas df

calculate.findCentroid(bolts)¶

This function takes the bolt pattern location data and determined the centroid. It also sets the calculator origin to be at said centroid.

Parameters

bolts (pandas df) – bolts and their parameters

Returns

bolts with the dimensions from the pattern centroid

Return type

pandas df

calculate.planeCheck(bolts, plane)¶

Function checks if 2D plane value in inputs.yml makes sense

Parameters

  • bolts (pandas df) – bolts data

  • plane (string) – plane

Returns

True if error check passes

Return type

Boolean

calculate.storeAttrs(bolts, axes)¶

Function stores the attributes in the pandas df

Parameters

bolts (pandas df) – bolts dataframe

Returns

df with stored attributes

Return type

pandas df

post.py¶

post.createPLOT(bolts, axes, output_path)¶

Create 2x2 subplot of shear and normal stresses

Parameters

  • bolts (pandas df) – df of bolts

  • axes (list) – axes according to user defined plane

  • output_path (string) – output path of picture

Returns

absolute path to plot

Return type

string

Helper function to get colors for bar chart

Parameters

bolts (pandas df) – properties of bolts
